info.name: Causes Module API
info.description:
Complete Postman collection for Crescent Change Causes module. This collection covers all endpoints for cause management, including creation, retrieval, updates, and status management.

## Key Features:
- Public endpoints for browsing causes
- Organization endpoints for cause management
- Admin endpoints for status management
- Category management
- Advanced filtering and pagination

## Authentication:
- Public endpoints: No authentication required
- Organization endpoints: Requires ORGANIZATION or ADMIN role JWT token
- Admin-only endpoints: Requires ADMIN role JWT token

## Testing Flow:
1. Get categories → 2. Create cause → 3. Get all causes → 4. Get cause by ID → 5. Update cause → 6. Update status (admin) → 7. Delete cause

## Important Notes:
- Organization users can only manage their own causes
- Admin users can manage all causes and update status
- Status values: pending, suspended, verified
- Category values: water, education, food, youth, orphans, quran_education, health_medical, emergency_relief, shelter_housing, mosque_utilities, zakat, sadaqah, ramadan, qurban, fitrah, admin_operational, refugees, digital_dawah, women_families

item.name: Public Endpoints

request.description:
Get all available cause categories. This is a public endpoint that doesn't require authentication.

**Response:**
Returns an array of category objects with their values and labels.

**Use Cases:**
- Populate category dropdowns in forms
- Display available categories to users
- Filter causes by category

query.description: Filter by category (water, education, food, youth, orphans, quran_education, health_medical, emergency_relief, shelter_housing, mosque_utilities, zakat, sadaqah, ramadan, qurban, fitrah, admin_operational, refugees, digital_dawah, women_families)
Sort order: asc or desc (default: desc)

request.description:
Get all causes with advanced filtering and pagination. This is a public endpoint.

**Query Parameters:**
- category: Filter by cause category
- status: Filter by cause status (pending, suspended, verified)
- organization: Filter by organization ID
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- limit: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- sortBy: Field to sort by (default: createdAt)
- sortOrder: Sort order - asc or desc (default: desc)

**Response:**
- data: Array of cause objects
- meta: Pagination metadata (page, limit, total, totalPage)

**Use Cases:**
- Browse all causes
- Filter causes by category or status
- Search causes by organization
- Implement pagination in frontend

item.name: Organization Endpoints

request.description:
Create a new cause. Requires ORGANIZATION or ADMIN role authentication.

**Authentication:**
- ORGANIZATION role: Automatically uses the authenticated organization's ID
- ADMIN role: Can specify organization ID in request body

**Required Fields:**
- name: Cause name (string, 1-100 characters)
- category: Cause category (enum - see categories endpoint)

**Optional Fields:**
- description: Cause description (string, max 500 characters)
- organization: Organization ID (required for ADMIN, auto-set for ORGANIZATION)

**Category Values:**
water, education, food, youth, orphans, quran_education, health_medical, emergency_relief, shelter_housing, mosque_utilities, zakat, sadaqah, ramadan, qurban, fitrah, admin_operational, refugees, digital_dawah, women_families

**Response:**
Returns created cause object with default status 'pending'.

**Note:** Organization users cannot specify organization ID - it's automatically set to their own organization.

Update an existing cause. Requires ORGANIZATION or ADMIN role authentication.

**Authentication:**
- ORGANIZATION role: Can only update their own causes
- ADMIN role: Can update any cause

**Parameters:**
- id: Cause ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Optional Fields (all fields are optional):**
- name: Cause name (string, 1-100 characters)
- description: Cause description (string, max 500 characters)
- category: Cause category (enum)

**Validation:**
- Organization users must own the cause
- All fields are optional but at least one must be provided
- Category must be a valid enum value

**Response:**
Returns updated cause object.

**Note:** Status cannot be updated via this endpoint - use Update Cause Status endpoint (admin only).

Delete a cause. Requires ORGANIZATION or ADMIN role authentication.

**Authentication:**
- ORGANIZATION role: Can only delete their own causes
- ADMIN role: Can delete any cause

**Parameters:**
- id: Cause ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Validation:**
- Organization users must own the cause
- Cause must exist

**Response:**
Returns deleted cause object.

**Warning:** This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Consider updating status to 'suspended' instead.

item.description: Endpoints for organization users to manage their causes. Requires ORGANIZATION or ADMIN role authentication. Organization users can only manage their own causes.

item.name: Admin Endpoints

request.description:
Update cause status. ADMIN role only.

**Authentication:**
- Requires ADMIN role JWT token

**Parameters:**
- id: Cause ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Required Fields:**
- status: Cause status (enum: pending, suspended, verified)

**Status Values:**
- pending: Newly created, awaiting review (default)
- suspended: Temporarily disabled
- verified: Approved and active

**Response:**
Returns updated cause object with new status.

**Use Cases:**
- Approve new causes (pending → verified)
- Suspend problematic causes (verified → suspended)
- Reactivate suspended causes (suspended → verified)
- Review and moderate cause submissions
